CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1945, pg. 1 reads: "Opposes Bias - Madam Vijaya L. Pandit, India Congress leader, scored prejudice and color barriers in her address at the annual meeting of the Maternal Health Center, Monday, at the William Penn Hotel. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Vijaya Lakshmi Pandit wearing light colored sari, seated in carved wooden chair, in William Penn Hotel with Toki Schalk Johnson and P. L. Prattis seated in background
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Prattis, P. L.Johnson, Toki Schalk.William Penn Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pandit, Vijaya Lakshmi, 1900-1990.
